amendment.description: To limit the expansion of premium assistance for households above 500 percent of the federal poverty line.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1331 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 105.

action.text: Amendment SA 1331 proposed by Senator Lee to Amendment SA 891. (consideration: CR S1258; text: CR S1258) To limit the expansion of premium assistance for households above 500 percent of the federal poverty line.
